Description: Producer price index by product (G products)

Note: Stochastically computed each period from covariance matrix (not a fixed parameter). Represents external Euro Area GDP shock that drives Rest of World dynamics. Drawn from multivariate normal distribution via Cholesky decomposition.

Stochastically computed each period from covariance matrix (not a fixed parameter). Directly affects export demand in rotw_import_export(): C_E = exp(α*log(C_E) + β + epsilon_E). Correlated with other epsilon shocks.

Stochastically computed each period from covariance matrix (not a fixed parameter). Directly affects import supply in rotw_import_export(): Y_I = exp(α*log(Y_I) + β + epsilon_I). Correlated with other epsilon shocks.
